actions.text: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A057) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A057) offered by Ms. Meng to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A057) offered by Ms. Meng to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A057) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment requires the Secretary to revise the crash investigation data collection system to include additional data regarding child restraint systems whenever there are child occupants present in vehicle crashes.
purpose: An amendment No. 16 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to require the Secretary to revise the crash investigation data collection system to include additional data regarding child restraint systems whenever there are child occupants present in vehicle crashes.
